title: Screen resize
body: After champion selection my load screen enlarges so much it only shows 2-3 champions, then during game play I can only see upper left portion of the screen due to how large it gets, started after last patch  any thoughts on how to fix this problem

replies.body:
Often times when I see this issue, it's caused by a number of factors. The most common are display driver issues or windows settings. I recommend working through [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) in order to address the most frequent fixes.

Let me know if these steps resolved it for ya!
